endpoints.description: Retrieves the current real-time energy generation statistics from renewable resources.
Schedules and configures the deployment of energy storage systems based on real-time or predictive data.
Provides a detailed report of resource efficiency over a specified time period.
Updates the operational thresholds for renewable energy generation systems to optimize production.
Fetches the current settings for system alerts and notifications.
Configures new or modifies existing alert settings for monitoring systems.
Returns projections of energy generation based on historical and current data.
Schedules maintenance operations for renewable energy generation facilities.
Returns the operational status of all monitored utility systems.
Deletes stored historical generation data that meets specific criteria for archival or compliance management.
